layout.dados: select c1.data, coalesce(c1.entrada, 0) as entrada, coalesce(c2.saida, 0) as saida, conta_saldo('1.3.03'::text, $data_ini::date) as saldo_ini from ( select data, sum(valor) as entrada from movto where data between $data_ini and $data_fim and conta_debitar='1.3.03' group by data) c1 full join (select data, sum(valor) as saida from movto where data between $data_ini and $data_fim and conta_creditar='1.3.03' group by data) c2 on (c1.data=c2.data)
layout.apelidos: 1 rel_posto_nome tam=60 2 rel_data_hora tam=18 3 data tam=10 fmt=data 4 entrada tam=10 fmt=%.02f 5 saida tam=10 fmt=%.02f 6 saldo_ini tam=10 fmt=%.02f 7 total_entrada tam=10 fmt=%.02f func=soma campo=entrada 8 total_saida tam=10 fmt=%.02f func=soma campo=saida 9 saldo tam=10 fmt=%.02f expr=saldo_ini+total_entrada-total_saida
